channel.title: The proverbial fork.

item.title: August 30
item.description: I am simulatesously on a path to self-destruction, and bringing in the professionals to stop me. Would you like to know more?
item.content: I am simulatesously on a path to self-destruction, and bringing in the professionals to stop me. Would you like to know more?
